alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 17 at 5:58PM CDT until March 17 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL CADDO COUNTY... At 558 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fort Cobb Reservoir, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Carnegie, Binger, Fort Cobb, Eakly, Fort Cobb Reservoir, Alfalfa and Albert. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
